article:
'San Leandro LINKS' or 'West San Leandro Shuttle' usually referred to simply as
the 'Links Bus' is a free public transit service in San Leandro,
California. [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/BATN/message/40835 San Leandro
city council votes to continue funding LINKS shuttle], by Karen Holzmeister. The
[[Hayward Daily Review]]. March 17, 2009. Retrieved November 24, 2010. [http://www.sanleandrolinks.com/map.php San Leandro Links schedule
and Map], SanLeandroLinks.com. 2010. Retrieved November 23, 2010. [http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P2-
19885964.html Hayward, San Leandro link shuttle bus services], by Christopher
Noceda. [[Oakland Tribune]]. April 4, 2009. Retrieved November 24,
2010. [http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P2-19652640.html
Council wants to continue shuttle buses in west San Leandro], by Karen
Holzmeister. Oakland Tribune. December 21, 2008. Retrieved November 24,
2010. [http://transit.511.org/frames/external.aspx?url=ht-
tp://www.sanleandrolinks.com/&backurl=http://transit.511.org/schedules/index.as-
px%23m1=S%26m2=shuttle Links], 511. 2010. Retrieved November 24, 2010.
categories: Public transportation in Alameda County, California
Transportation in the San Francisco Bay Area
